subject: Mascots
Factories and Manufacturing
lead_paragraph: Over some 35 years at his Creations JCT factory in Mascouche, Quebec, Jean-Claude Tremblay has built some of sports fans’ favorite mascots.
snippet: Over some 35 years at his Creations JCT factory in Mascouche, Quebec, Jean-Claude Tremblay has built some of sports fans’ favorite mascots.
